raiseActionButtons.title: Raise action buttons
raiseActionButtons.description: This option highlights action buttons (such as "Warn User", "OK", "Submit") so that they are easier to distinguish from other buttons.

rapidClickProtection.title: Rapid click protection
rapidClickProtection.description: Set the time period to wait before allowing clicks on potentially damaging buttons (rollbacks, warns).

highContrast.title: High Contrast
highContrast.description: Where supported, make icons less coloured and favour higher contrast. This will override only default colours, and not those you have customised.

revertOption.title: Revert options
revertOption.description: Main revert options, shown whenever viewing a diff. Other revert options are available in the "More Options" panel. Available options are set on a per-wiki basis.

revertDoneOption.title: Post-rollback action
revertDoneOption.description: The default action to take after reverting an edit by a user.

revertMethod.title: Revert method
revertMethod.description: The method of reversion to use. Rollback requires the rollback right, but is much faster than a standard undo. Psuedo-rollback (also known as "rollback-like") requires no special rights, but is slower than rollback (especially for slower connections).

redirectIfNotLatest.title: Redirect if not latest
redirectIfNotLatest.description: If enabled, upon detection that the revision being reverted is no longer the latest revision, you will be redirected to the latest revision of the page.

ignoreSameUserLatest.title: Ignore latest revision from the same user
ignoreSameUserLatest.description: If enabled, the revision to be reverted will be reverted anyway even if it is no longer the latest revision if the latest revision was made by the same user and has no intermediate edits.

noticeOrder.title: Notice template order
noticeOrder.description: You can sort notice templates by their title (e.g. "Vandalism"), or by their template name (e.g. "uw-vandalism").

pageIcons.title: Page icons
pageIcons.description: You can change which page icons to show and in which order do they appear.

revertOptions.title: Revert options
revertOptions.description: You can change which revert options to show and in which order do they appear. You can also add your own custom revert options aside from those found in the per-wiki configuration.
